column1: The Purple Pig////Unbelievable experience! I didn't know much about this place before arriving in Chicago
column2: other than it was highly rated... then to find out how popular this place apparently is and that it is a Jimmy Bannos
column3: Jr. restaurant. Tucked away in an office building on the Magnificent Mile
column5: Swine & Wine". Although we had no wine from their grand selection
column6: there were wine pairings with almost every item on the menu.  The exotic menu
column9: neither too large nor too small.  Having already looked at the menu prior to arriving
